featured.name: APWG
featured.info: Generate pronounceable gibberish passwords. Shorter and more secure than word-based.

featured.name: Autopassword
featured.info: Generate deterministic passwords from a secret key and site name using SHA-256.

featured.name: Quick Note
featured.info: Encrypted note-taking with server persistence. Lock notes to prevent others from editing.

featured.name: Fast Link
featured.info: Quick URL sharing between devices. One link at a time for fast, temporary sharing.

featured.name: ComponentLib
featured.info: Professional UI component library with 30+ components - forms, data tables, overlays, panels and more. PrimeReact-level features, zero dependencies.

featured.name: Demo Shop
featured.info: E-commerce demo showcasing router, stores, and UI components - product catalog, filtering, cart with localStorage persistence, and checkout flow.

other.name: PWGen v1
other.info: Legacy password generator using Japanese syllables. Deprecated, use SPWG instead.

other.name: Embedding
other.info: Self-contained framework bundle demo - single file, no build step, perfect for embedding in static sites.

other.name: Playground
other.info: Interactive demos showcasing the custom zero-dependency web framework features.

other.name: Test Suite
other.info: Comprehensive test suite for the framework (~190 tests covering all features).

other.name: SPWG
other.info: Generate secure, memorable passphrases using a 55,000+ word dictionary.

other.name: Web Grep
other.info: Filter text using regular expressions. A browser-based grep tool.
